pr_title: Deprecate all variants of a ParseField with no replacement

timeline.message: Make it possible to deprecate all variants of a ParseField with no replacement

timeline.bodyHTML:
Would it be simpler to add something like:

if (fullyDeprecated) {
  deprecationHandler.usedDeprecatedField(fieldName);
  return true;
}

above this if statement?
timeline.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: We still need to check that one of the possible names matches so it's not quite as simple as that, unfortunately
replies.author: romseygeek

timeline.author: nik9000
